definitions: a bird found in the forests of Central and South America, the male of which is frequently brilliantly colored.

notes.text: Family Cotingidae (the cotinga family): several genera, especially Cotinga, and numerous species. The cotinga family also includes the bellbirds, umbrellabirds, and cocks-of-the-rock, and is sometimes placed within the family Tyrannidae

shortDefinitions: bird found in forests of Central and South America
